entry.title: Minion Gummies - 50ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Regal Confections
Type: Bulk
Price: 5.99

A Tasty and Goofy Treat to Share

     What's more fun than a gummy treat that's shaped just like one of the loveable Minions from Despicable Me? The only thing we can think of is 50 of them! 

     Each gummy Minion is individually wrapped making this bag an easy and affordable option to hand out to trick-or-treaters on Halloween. They also make great piñata stuffers or snacks for a fantastic party!

250g | 1 bulk bag contains 50 individually wrapped pieces

entry.title: Popeye Candy Sticks - 24ct
entry.summary:
Vendor: Regal Confections
Type: Bulk
Price: 4.99

Nostalgic 50s Sweets to Share!

     Popeye Candy Sticks are the perfect treat to share with all the kids on Halloween, they bring back so many fond trick-or-treating memories! This 24 count bulk bag makes it easy to fill a bowl full of the retro classic candy to pass around or leave out for a fun party. 

60g | 1 bulk bag

entry.title: Cadbury Dairy Milk Mini Eggs Bars - 100g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cadbury
Type: Chocolate
Price: 3.99

Dairy Milk x Mini Eggs

     Mini Eggs are not just for Easter, any true Canadian knows this. They're great for munching, baking, gifting, and now they're all nice and cozy inside their new nest -  a Cadbury Milk Chocolate bar!

     Each piece of rich, smooth, and creamy milk chocolate is packed with delicious Mini Eggs. Let the chocolate melt and have all the eggs gather on your tongue or just chow down, however you decide to enjoy these bars, they're the perfect solution for your sweet tooth!

     This is the hottest collab of the decade, so don't miss out on all the delicious yumminess!

Try all the Dairy Milk Chocolate Bars

100g | 1 bar

entry.title: Coffee Crisp Double Double Wafer Bar - 50 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle
Type: Chocolate
Price: 1.59

Ultimate Canadian Candy Bar

Have your coffee crisp, with this iconic Canadian Candy Bar! The Coffee Crisp Double Double Wafer Bar will seriously make all your coffee and chocolate dreams come true!
Layers of light and thin wafers that hold between them a delicious and delicate coffee creme, that is wrapped in a luscious, yet thin layer of a supreme tasting chocolatey coating! 
Made with all-natural flavours so you can really feel good about consuming your coffee in a chocolate bar form! How awesome is that?
Have a taste of a legendary Canadian Candy bar with the Coffee Crisp Double Double Wafer Bar!

50 g | 24 Count Box
